description:
Special Aircraft that appeared in the main game, including the Japan Coast Guard, are back again!

Respond calmly to sudden emergency missions and protect the safety of Haneda's skies!



[Details]
STAGE 1 "Emergency Dispatch! Early morning 118!"
  [Difficulty level] NORMAL [Assigned time] 8:30～9:15

STAGE 2 "Strong winds blowing at Haneda Airport!"
  [Difficulty level] HARD [Assigned time] 14:00～15:00

STAGE 3 "Heavy traffic at Terminal 3!"
  [Difficulty level] HARD [Assigned time] 16:15～17:15

STAGE 4 "Guide the government plane to safety!"
  [Difficulty level] HARD [Assigned time] 11:00～12:30

STAGE 5 "Multiple Happenings! Busy Haneda Airport!"
  [Difficulty level] EXTEND [Assigned time] 16:30～18:15

* "I am an Air Traffic Controller - Airport Hero Haneda" is required to use this content.  If you need to apply the latest patch, please update the game before playing.
* In order to play this content you must have cleared up to STAGE 2 in the game.
name: Special Mission Pack
